instructions: Identify typical actions observed on a worksite. Use the provided labels.

actions.label: Operating Machinery
actions.description: Person controlling heavy equipment (e.g., excavator, crane).

actions.label: Carrying Materials
actions.description: Person transporting items (e.g., pipes, wood, tools).

actions.label: Manual Labor
actions.description: Person engaged in physical work (e.g., digging, hammering, lifting).

actions.label: Supervising
actions.description: Person observing or directing others, often holding plans or pointing.

actions.label: Standing/Walking
actions.description: General movement or stationary presence on the site.
